ol.li: undertakes the piped distribution of drinking water or non-drinking water for supply; or
is the operator of a sewerage system or a stormwater drainage system.

callout.p: A Network Utility Operator in most States and Territories is the water and sewerage authority licensed to supply water and receive sewage and/or stormwater. The authority operates or proposes to operate a network that undertakes the distribution of water for supply and undertakes to receive sewage and/or stormwater drainage. This authority may be a licensed utility, local government body or council.
